name: Trigrams
description:
Trigrams is a puzzle game inspired by the classic nonogram format. Instead of finding solutions by marking boxes, this game uses triangles to add an extra dimension to puzzle solving. In addition to the traditional row and column conditions, you must also solve conditions along the diagonals of the puzzle. Continue solving puzzles and you may find additional tricks to challenge you...

Release Notes:

Currently only puzzles in sections 1 through 3 are available in addition to several bonus levels as an initial teaser of advanced mechanics. Unrestricted endless puzzle mode is also available, although this may rarely produce puzzles with multiple solutions.
